title: nihil0x
author: nihil0x
content: I was looking at Mining data for Radiant [RXD] and noticed this https://imgur.com/a/rQ2L63Qhttps://ibb.co/znBC0vHhttps://i.ibb.co/JBG8MJF/2023-08-30-07-32-33-Radiant-mining-calculator-Radiant-minerstat-Brave.pngWhat was the cause of the Spike in Income the peak in Reward then the consequent Reversal in April 23The difficulty was trending down and Rewards Up then a complete reversal* was something changed to the protocol? * was this Asics?

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Please move this to the altcoin board.
